title: Creeping inferno
data: {{version030}} {{monster info}} ==Useful Info== '''Creeping infernos''' are fragile entities that explode into [[Fire Storm]]s (8d8.25 damage) when killed. They are found naturally in [[Gehenna]], or created by [[stoker]]s. They move like [[lurking horror]]s. Every turn, if a creeping inferno is in your [[line of sight]], it can only move if distance <= 1d(LOS_range + 1) - 1.{{source ref|0.30.1|mon-act.cc|579}} So when encountered at the edge of LOS, it is likely to not move, but the closer you get, the more likely it is to charge at you. ==Tips & Tricks== *Just about any attack, such as [[javelin]]s or any number of [[spell]]s, will take one out. ==History== *Creeping infernos were added in [[0.28]]. ==References==
